Rat Trap sighs in relief as he looks up to the stegosaurouses.

"Whew, save=
d by the same dinos we helped earlier.  I'm tell'n ya Night Shift, we got s=
ome big connections here now."

Night Shift looks up at them, he now spots =
a few more he hadn't seen before.

" Hey, must - be the rest of his herd.  =
Good tim'n guys.  With them outa the way, we can get back on track. "

The =
baby stego looks to him and grunts.  He points to a trickle of battery flui=
d comming down Night Shift's left side, on his mid section.

"What?  What's=
 wrong?"

Rat Trap spots it.

"Oh geeze, you can't feel that can ya?"

Nigh=
t Shift shakes his head.

"I can't feel my legs, or my lower servos. When I=
 smacked against that tree, I might've blown more than a few gaskets."

Rat=
 Trap transforms to robot mode.

"Not good, this is not good.  You can't ke=
ep gon' the way ya are now big guy.  Aw maaan, and it's gonna take more tha=
n the CR chamber ta put ya back tagether.  Your only hope is that I go back=
'n get help, but it'll take me forever ta get back."

Night Shift looks to =
a stegosaurous.

"Not - if ya showed those guys the way back.  They'll get =
a there in plenty of time."

A young adult stego steps out and lowers his n=
eck for Rat Trap.  Obviously he was the youngest of the adolescents and the=
 most fit for the long journey.  Rat Trap gets on, as the others hold their=
 ground around Night Shift.

"I'll be back as fast as I can, and this time =
I'll bring backup. Okay big guy, we gotta hussle."

The stegosaurous now he=
ads in the direction upon where Rat Trap and Night Shift originally came fr=
om.  His feet move quickly as he does his best to get Rat Trap back to the =
Ark safely. 

"This is Rat Trap Ta Rodimus over, Night Shift's damages are =
more serious than I thought, so I'm commn' back ta get help.  He's gonna ne=
ed some serious repairs and a transport back ta base, over'n out."
